name: Baldi Education Basics School
description:
You are on vacations mode and baldi is also availble to educate you. The story behind this game is that thers is no one in the school and your neighbor friend lost his books in the school and he asked you to help him. Now you have to find his books to help him, In this process you have to solve different tasks after finding every notebook! but becareful Baldi is behind you he is follwing you .
Just remember this!
It is really quite tough to escape from Baldi's attack in Baldi's Horror and Scary School.Along with fear you'll find Badis Adventure super excited.

Features for Baldi
- Learn basics of Baldi"s and go through all his tests
- High Quality graphics with great animations
- Best educational learning games
- Help your friend in finding notebooks
- Answer multiple question

Download Now For Free!
